name: El Instituto
overview: "The Institute" is a documentary series that, for 7 weeks and through 55 robotic cameras, records the day-to-day life of a group of 4th grade students at E.S.O. who is about to face graduation. A unique opportunity to appreciate the challenges and challenges of Spanish education inside.
